text: It really gives you a good idea of all the different things that the new gamepad can do.
speaker: A

text: I was really surprised by how much fun I was having with all the different minigames based on old Nintendo franchises.
speaker: A

text: Some of them are really good, especially when played multiplayer.
speaker: A

text: Probably the best games on there are the Pikmin one, the Metroid one, and the Donkey Kong one.
speaker: A

text: The only one that really sucks is the Octopus dancing.
speaker: A

text: A lot of the games are only okay by yourself.
speaker: A

text: You get a lot more fun out of if you play with more friends.
speaker: A

text: So, you know, if you're going to be playing your Wii U with a lot of people around, nintendo Land is absolutely worth a purchase.
speaker: A

text: To be honest, I was having so much fun with Nintendo Land that I kept going back to it.
speaker: A

text: It has a lot of variety.
speaker: A

text: It can really show you the ropes of what the gamepad can do.
speaker: A

text: And I think it's a better packing title than Wii Sports was.
speaker: A

text: For the original Wii, Nintendo Land earns an eight out of ten.
speaker: A
